definitions.text: a commissioned military officer in the United States Army or Air Force or Marines; below lieutenant colonel and above captain
British statesman who was prime minister from 1990 until 1997 (born in 1943)
a university student who is studying a particular field as the principal subject
the principal field of study of a student at a university
have as one's principal field of study
of greater importance or stature or rank
greater in number or size or amount
examples: a major portion (a majority) of the population
a major portion of the winnings

definitions.text: of the field of academic study in which one concentrates or specializes
of the elder of two boys with the same family name
